original: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kilesam ca iva na asaṅkiliṭṭham ca dhammam paṭicca na kilesaḥ ca iva na asaṅkiliṭṭhaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhañceva nano ca kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭho ceva nano ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na asaṅkiliṭṭham ca iva na no ca kilesam dhammam paṭicca na asaṅkiliṭṭhaḥ ca iva na no ca kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca naasaṅkiliṭṭhañceva nano ca kilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kilesam ca iva na asaṅkiliṭṭham ca na asaṅkiliṭṭham ca iva na no ca kilesam ca dhammam paṭicca na kilesaḥ ca iva na asaṅkiliṭṭhaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
